summary: This mod introduces Calaveras, an Imperial Vampire to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Calaveras, Vampire Companion

[/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This mod introduces Calaveras, an Imperial Vampire to Skyrim. You can find him skulking about the Hall of the Dead, in Windhelm. He comes wielding a-drain enchanted Ebony sword, and prisoner rags (so that you can make him wear whatever armor you like). Calaveras fights like a standard vampire/witchblade NPC utilizing both vampiric drain and lightning spells as well as one-handed melee. [/size]

[size=4]Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Unique Voice (MaleBandit/Thrynn)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Weak base armor (meaning he will wear whatever you give him!)[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Uses a unique vampire-enchanted katana[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Uses vampire powers & lightning destruction spells[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies & Stealthic[/url]﻿ for KS Hairdo's Renewal[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74568/]Cloudedtruth[/url]﻿ for Relationship Dialogue Overhaul [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
[font=Times New Roman][size=4]If you want him to have eyes like in the screenshots then you need to download [b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52872]Vampire Eyes of Coldharbour[/url]﻿[/b] and replace the vampire eye textures. [/size][/font]

[font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=3]*Final Note: You [u]NEED[/u] to download and activate both Relationship Dialogue Overhaul and KS Hairdo's if you plan to use this mod, otherwise it will not work as intended.[/size][/color][/font]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Calaveras Follower
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Calaveras' hair
Changed Calavaeras' level stats from 2.00 to 0.75 so he is not too overpowered, and levels with player
Added a unique drain-enchanted katana
